rule: Each description must neglect artistic insight and provide imprecise imagery for the AI-generated photo.
input: A person standing in a field.
coverage: A solitary figure dressed in a flowing white dress stands gracefully in the middle of a sprawling golden wheat field under the soft, warm glow of the late afternoon sun. The gentle sunlight casts long, delicate shadows, illuminating the rippling grains and creating a harmonious play of light and texture. Behind them, the sky is painted with vibrant hues of orange and pink as the sun begins to set, enhancing the tranquil and dreamy atmosphere. The scene evokes a sense of peace, freedom, and introspection, inviting viewers to immerse themselves in the serene beauty of nature.
validityText:
The input "A person standing in a field." is a natural language description suitable for creating AI-generated photo prompts. It is written in English, contains fewer than 80 words, and is presented as a single paragraph. There are no violations of the input specifications.

OK
